publication.title: JPMQ - An Advanced Persistent Message Queuing Service
publication.abstract: . Message oriented middleware (MOM) services, based on theconcept of persistent queues, are widely used for reliable asynchronouscommunication to deal with the disadvantages of the closely coupledcommunication model. This paper introduces some new functionality forqueuing services (QS) in order to make them more powerful for the needof modern application programs and presents JPMQ, a sample implementationof these concepts. As such,
